message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000, I could be flexible. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, Alice. However, I still feel that $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
